title: Good concept but a lot of bugs
text:

title: expect lengthy transactions  -  significantly understaffed helpdesk
text:
Summary: unreliable, understaffed service with undertrained people

Would I recommend: no 

I was supposed to get a gift (one type of transaction in Revolut). The way this is supposed to work: sender opens a gift in the app, you receive a notification almost instantly, which you need to accept to be able to receive the money sent to you. 

In my case, the sender initiated this transaction (gift) 2 weeks (!) ago and still there is no sign of it. Money was collected from sender`s account, but I have never received the notification about the gift to accept.
